title: Launcher wont start
body:
Literally, title says it all.. I open the shortcut on my desktop, launcher runs, gets to the loading (spinning) icon and crashes. once it crashes, relaunches and does the same thing over and over.


literally, broken. impossible to close via task manager also..

[Broken image here...](https://i.imgur.com/KvJyCHg.jpg)

replies.body: I'm curious if you have Discord running with the overlay turned on. We've noticed a bit ago that the Discord overlay has been causing problems exactly like this, so let's first check there. Make sure that overlay is turned off and try launching League again.
thank you fixed mine you have to disable the general overlay not just for league that's how I got my working thank you again
